name: Content Buddy
description:
Edit the text content in multiple layers, instances and components in Figma and FigJam files.


Content Buddy searches for text content in your selection and displays a list with each unique text content, then you can select each item individually and set a replacement text for all the layers where the original content appears.


Content Buddy works in instances, components, frames , groups and text shapes both for Figma and FigJam files.
